comments_since_last_sample.body: Who tucks their button down shirts like that?!  You don't need those belts to have a decent tuck dress shirt!
What brand is the black shirt you’re wearing in this video?

Im serious in this shit, I’ve learned as an 18 year old that if you are early 20s and teen, Aaron is not how you should get style advice. I did and it helped me get a start, but you have to get style inspiration from anyone or thing you like. Experiment with fit, wear baggy clothes, wear fit clothes, wear some crazy shit that nobody would rock because that is what fashion is about. Use these type of videos as a gateway drug into style,  but don’t only get everything from YouTuber like Aaron.
